original: Dahl, Torsten Salomon, direktörs-asiSLStent, Linköping, f. 30/12/97 i Växjö av förest. Salomon D. o. Emma Kristina Dahil. G. 27 m. Anna-Greta Bäcklund. Barn: Gunnar f. 32. — Stud iex. v. Växjö h. a. 1. 17. Värnpl. fänrik 40. Banktj :man i Sydsv. Kredit A-B o. A-B Sydsv. Banken 18-24, förvalt. v. Seffle Bryggeri i Säffle (tillh. A-B Svea Brygg, i Filipstad) 25-29, disp. v. Filipstads Bageri A-B i Filipstad 30-32, kont :chef, sederm. disp. v. A-B Arvid Petterssons Bröd-fa’br. i Eskilstuna 33-36, kamr. v. A-B Nya Centr |bryggeriet i Linköp. 37-40, dirrassist. där sed. 40. Led. av styr. f. Filipstads Bageri A-B 30-32, A-B Arvid Petterssons Brödfabr. 35-36 o. A-B Druvans Mineralvattenfabr. i Linköp. sed. 45, -led. av 45 års fastig-h:tax:nd i Linköp., suppl. i rör:tax:-ndn där sed. 44. Medl. av Frimurarorden. Hobbies: filateli, sport.
translated: Dahl, Torsten Salomon, director-ASIStent, Linköping, born on 30/12/97 in Växjö to parents Salomon D. and Emma Kristina Dahil. Married in 1927 to Anna-Greta Bäcklund. They had one child, Gunnar, born in 1932. Torsten completed his studies at Växjö high school in 1917 and was a sergeant in the military in 1940. He worked as a bank clerk for Sydsv. Kredit A-B and A-B Sydsv. Banken from 1918 to 1924. Then he managed the Seffle Bryggeri in Säffle (belonging to A-B Svea Brygg, in Filipstad) from 1925 to 1929. From 1930 to 1932, he was the director of Filipstads Bageri A-B in Filipstad, then became the head of the department and later a director at the A-B Arvid Petterssons Bröd-fa’br. in Eskilstuna from 1933 to 1936. In 1937, he became a chamberlaine at A-B Nya Centrbryggeriet in Linköping, and later an assistant director in 1940. He served on the board of directors for Filipstads Bageri A-B from 1930 to 1932, A-B Arvid Petterssons Brödfabr from 1935 to 1936 and A-B Druvans Mineralvattenfabr. in Linköp. since 1945. He was a member of the 45-year real estate commission in Linköping and has been a member of the pipe commission since 1944. He was a member of the Freemason Order and had hobbies of philately and sports.
